Introduction
This topic contains information on processing of herbicide claims, including
overview of policy changes based on
Public Law (PL)
116-23
, and
117-168
claims requiring centralized processing for research of herbicide exposure
regional office (RO) processing of herbicide claims
development responsibilities for centralized processing teams
requesting Federal records of service
, and
action to take when the
claimed disability is not recognized under 38 CFR 3.309(e)
, and
Veteran claims herbicide exposure but does not claim a disability
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) Based on Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
